Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: MAK "M.K."
Reviews.Content: The phone is what I expected.  The back cover does not close tight due to a sheared clip, but I am satisfied with the purchase and will keep it.

Reviews.Title: It Really is OEM!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Came in a Verizon branded box. It is nice and glossy just like advertised. Great product protects from drops and has a nice grip to it.

Reviews.Title: Silicone cover
Reviews.Author: Rey Lima
Reviews.Content: works okaybut i have a problem when i try to recharge my phonethe power input does not fit great.

Reviews.Title: Silicone cover
Reviews.Author: Cynthia K. Cooper "Coops"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good case for the cost. I used a more expensive case and it was just to bulky and would stick to the material when it was placed in a pocket. This case is low profile and easy on materal.
